Auckland car thief Maui Warahi jailed for fatal punch to man who wanted vehicle back https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-car-thief-maui-warahi-jailed-for-fatal-punch-to-man-who-wanted-vehicle-back/XZL32AUUTRGFFCMKBMDDNZ53HA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-car-thief-maui-warahi-jailed-for-fatal-punch-to-man-who-wanted-vehicle-back/XZL32AUUTRGFFCMKBMDDNZ53HA/ Craig KapitanThe victim was backing away when he was hit with a blindside punch. Fri, 20 Dec 2024 21:00:00 +0000 Police released this photo of Jay Maui Wallace, who now goes by Maui Warahi or just Maui, in 2004 when he was wanted for driving while disqualified, burglary, possession of instruments for the manufacture of methamphetamine, and unlawfully taking a motor vehicle. Photo / Supplied
Waikato woman drove high on meth with kids in the car, killed beloved 80-year-old https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/waikato-woman-drove-high-on-meth-with-kids-in-the-car-killed-beloved-80-year-old/C5MKFMOPBBAZREBVZ22EM6XHK4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/waikato-woman-drove-high-on-meth-with-kids-in-the-car-killed-beloved-80-year-old/C5MKFMOPBBAZREBVZ22EM6XHK4/ Belinda FeekThe woman had kids in the car when she ploughed into the back of Raymond Mathews. Fri, 20 Dec 2024 19:00:00 +0000 Raymond Mathews, 80, was killed in a crash outside the Ngāruawāhia Golf Club after Vanessa Railey, high on drugs, smashed into the back of him. Photo / Supplied
